description: The skill of end effector reaching to a desired pose. position is a 3D vector and orientation is a quaternion(optional).
The skill of grasping an object. object_name is the name of the object to be grasped. The skill will reach and grasp the object, no need to reach before grasp.
The skill of placing an object. object_name is the name of the object to be placed. position is a 3D vector and orientation is a quaternion(optional).
The skill of resetting the robot to its initial state.
